summary: Senior Product Manager with 6+ years of experience leading B2B SaaS products from ideation to scale. Expert in data-driven decision making, user research, and cross-functional team leadership with a track record of shipping products that drive revenue growth.
highlights: Led product strategy resulting in 300% user growth and $15M ARR
Launched 4 major features adopted by 80%+ of customer base
Built and managed roadmaps for products serving 100K+ users

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Leading product strategy for enterprise collaboration platform serving 100K+ users
achievements: Drove 300% user growth by launching mobile app and real-time collaboration features
Increased monthly recurring revenue by $5M through strategic feature launches
Led cross-functional team of 15 engineers, designers, and data analysts
Reduced churn by 25% through data-driven retention initiatives
Established product analytics framework adopted company-wide

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Managed checkout and payments product for e-commerce platform processing $500M+ annually
achievements: Launched one-click checkout increasing conversion rate by 35%
Built international payments support expanding to 15 new markets
Partnered with 6 payment providers to reduce transaction fees by 20%
Conducted 50+ user interviews to inform product roadmap

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: First PM hire supporting mobile app with 500K+ users
achievements: Designed and shipped push notification system increasing DAU by 40%
Led A/B testing program resulting in 20% improvement in retention
Created product analytics dashboard tracking 25+ key metrics
